Html:
Hi radioman, got my custom routes working , easy, thanks.  May i suggest a new function  ZoomToRoute(Route)   which simply zooms to the given route, similar to the ZoomToMarkers.

Also, i wonder if its possible to detect a MouseOver event on the routes ?

Thanks,

MouseOver is complicated... any ideas?

ZoomToRoute ok.
i know MouseOver would be complicated, i'm not sure of any easier way than the usual checking of each point on mousemouse, which would not be a good idea.
need some smart way to do it, hm...

any chance you can add the ZoomToRoute  while you are in there making changes ?

thanks
